Body: The list of positive and negative (optional) example items.

Filter Name: A unique name for the filter.

Get fingerprint: Configure if the fingerprint should be returned as part of the results.

Response Content Type: Defines what type of data will come from the server. Currently it is only JSON.

Retina Name: Retina used for word space models. It allows to compute distances between terms, which can be used to determine the degree of similarity between terms.
There are two types of retina:

ol: An english language retina focusing on synonymous similarity.
An english language retina balancing synonymous and associative similarity.

Sparsity: Sparsify the resulting expression to this percentage.
